subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: For the near-medalists — and a few not-so-near-medalists — left looking up at the podium, recognition comes in the form of a personally inscribed, autopen-signed, formal Olympic diploma.
snippet: For the near-medalists — and a few not-so-near-medalists — left looking up at the podium, recognition comes in the form of a personally inscribed, autopen-signed, formal Olympic diploma.
